meta.title: Mostafa Khaled Abd el Barr | React.js Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing React/Next.js projects and skills

about.bio: React.js developer focused on building scalable, performant web apps with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern tooling. Experience delivering multi-tenant LMS platforms and SaaS products, integrating Stripe, and optimizing UI/UX with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI.
focus: Building scalable multi-tenant platforms with Next.js & Supabase
Creating reusable UI systems with Tailwind CSS & Shadcn UI
Integrating payments and subscriptions with Stripe

experience.title: Full Stack Developer (Next.js & Supabase)
experience.description: Contributing to large-scale software like Jadrat, Tamm, and Banque Misr. Built multi-tenant LMS platforms and features across various SaaS projects using React.js, Next.js, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and Stripe.
achievements: Designed and developed scalable multi-tenant LMS platforms
Integrated Stripe for payments and subscription management
Delivered reusable, maintainable components to improve team efficiency
Optimized backend workflows with Next.js Server Actions

experience.title: Frontend ReactJS Developer (Freelance)
experience.description: Collaborated on SmartDonor-Admin, an intuitive Charity Admin Dashboard using modern React tooling.
achievements: Implemented core dashboard views and reusable components
Applied data fetching and caching with TanStack Query
Shipped responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI

experience.title: Internship Front End Developer - React & Next.js
experience.description: Contributed to projects including Afrita, Al Omran, and New Oil with a focus on responsive UI and performance.
achievements: Built responsive interfaces and optimized bundle size
Collaborated in a multi-repo environment to deliver features
Improved code quality with reusable UI patterns

experience.title: Internship Frontend Developer (React.js)
experience.description: Worked with the backend team to build a React.js project for a Driver website enabling efficient exchange between senders and receivers.
achievements: Delivered core pages and forms with React Hook Form
Improved UX with validation using Zod/Yup
Collaborated closely with backend to align API contracts

experience.title: Freelance Frontend Developer
experience.description: Building pixel-perfect websites with Tailwind CSS and modern React tooling for various clients.
achievements: Maintained strong client communication and on-time delivery
